    • 方法详细资料

      • refreshAndClearCache

        public void refreshAndClearCache​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​GoogleCloudStorageClientSettings> clientsSettings)
        Refreshes the client settings and clears the client cache. Subsequent calls to GoogleCloudStorageService#client will return new clients constructed using the parameter settings.
        参数:
        clientsSettings - the new settings used for building clients for subsequent requests

      • client

        public com.google.cloud.storage.Storage client​(java.lang.String clientName)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Attempts to retrieve a client from the cache. If the client does not exist it will be created from the latest settings and will populate the cache. The returned instance should not be cached by the calling code. Instead, for each use, the (possibly updated) instance should be requested by calling this method.
        参数:
        clientName - name of the client settings used to create the client
        返回:
        a cached client storage instance that can be used to manage objects (blobs)
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • setOverrideApplicationName

        @Deprecated
public void setOverrideApplicationName​(java.lang.String applicationName)
        已过时。
        Sets the value that overrides the application name while creating the client. Normally the application name is the picked up from the GCS client settings in the elasticsearch conf file. Set to null to not override.

      • setOverrideConnectTimeout

        @Deprecated
public void setOverrideConnectTimeout​(TimeValue connectTimeout)
        已过时。
        Sets the value that overrides the connect timeout while creating the client. Normally the connect timeout is picket up from the GCS client settings in the elasticsearch conf file. Set to null to not override.

      • setOverrideReadTimeout

        @Deprecated
public void setOverrideReadTimeout​(TimeValue readTimeout)
        已过时。
        Sets the value that overrides the read timeout while creating the client. Normally the read timeout is picked up from the GCS client settings in the elasticsearch conf file. Set to null to not override.
